review: I don't tend to write too many reviews, I do them when either I really like a product or really upset with a product or the service behind it.Lets face it, there are many streaming devices out there with very similar capabilities but this little guy held an interesting promise that other devices didn't promise - Miracast the ability to stream/duplicate your device screen on the TV. Very cool feature and as such its being advertised.Tried it out, it doesn't work with any of the windows devices. Looking on the web, searching twitter it seems I am not the only one who expected to get it and never did.Amazon advertisement is misleading - just don't buy this if this feature is important to you.Beyond that, tried the device on two TV's with only half success- I guess this is also a standard issue? 😉
